name: Wansiri AI Altrady Bot Setup Instructions

step.name: Step 1: Set up your Winner1 Altrady Bot

itemListElement.text: Log in or sign up for a free Altrady account: https://www.altrady.com/?a=U3i4tYfZxk48kv4T
Go to Altrady - Bots (left sidebar menu).
Click '+ Create' at top right.
Choose Signal Bot and click 'Create Bot'.
Settings - General: Signals = Webhook, Account = 'Binance Paper' (test without real money), Currency = USDT, Bot name = Winner1. Save your API key and secret.
Settings - Filters: Max concurrent positions = 45, Max positions per market = 3, 24h volume min = 1.
Entry Settings: Order = Fixed amount, Initial order size = 20, Entry price deviation % = 0.5.
Scroll down and press 'Save Settings'.
You have successfully set up your Winner1 Altrady Bot.

step.name: Step 4: Set up your Wansiri Pro 2 Altrady Bot

Go to Altrady - Bots (left sidebar menu).
Click '+ Create' at top right.

Settings - General: Signals = Webhook, Account = 'Binance Paper', Currency = USDT, Bot name = My Wansiri Pro 2. Save your API key and secret.
Settings - Filters: Max concurrent positions = 45, Max positions per market = 45, 24h volume min = 1.

step.name: Step 5: Connect your Altrady Bots to the Wansiri AI Dashboard

itemListElement.text: Select a strategy (Winner1, Winner2, or Wansiri Pro) and click 'Add to My Strategies' in the Dashboard.
Enter your Altrady Bot API Key and Secret.
Press 'Save' to store your API credentials.
Press 'Start' to begin sending alerts to your Altrady Bot.
Press 'Stop' to halt sending alerts.
Before using bots with real funds, thoroughly test on Binance Paper account to avoid financial risk.
Ensure you save your API keys securely and never share them publicly.
